title: The Cathode ray tube: how it works
creator_credit: Jam Handy Organization and Bureau of Aeronautics
brief_description: Demonstrates lucidly every part of the cathode ray tube, showing its construction and function, and how it contributes to the process of producing a visual image of an electronic impulse.
